DOC.brief_title: A Study Debio 025 ( Alisporivir ) Combined With Peg-IFNα2a Ribavirin Treatment naïve Chronic Hepatitis C Genotype 1 Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This international , multicentre , randomise , double-blind , placebo-controlled , 4-arm , parallel-group , multiple dose phase II study compare 3 Debio 025 ( alisporivir ) /peg-IFNα2a/ribavirin regimen SOC treatment treatment naïve chronic HCV genotype 1 patient . Patients randomise 1 4 arm receive either Debio 025/peg-IFNα2a/ribavirin triple therapy fix treatment duration 48 week ( Treatment A ) 24 week ( Treatment B ) , Debio 025/peg-IFNα2a/ribavirin triple therapy response-based treatment duration 24 48 week ( Treatment C ) , blind SOC treatment 48 week ( Treatment D ) . Follow-up 24 week treatment arm .
